appId.description: The identifier of the Sinao application you are using. Each application corresponds to a company and an accounting. A user can have several Sinao applications. To retrieve the identifiers of its applications, you must call the endpoint `/apps`.

format.description: The export format can be a FEC (universal - similar to the French legal file 'Fichier des Ecritures Comptables') or specific for accounting software

start_at.description: Automatically find export entities from a date range

end_at.description: Automatically find export entities from a date range

since.description: Automatically find export entities since a date

since_last.description: Automatically find the export entities since the last export downloaded
